title: Roasted butternut squash with pine nuts and feta
ingredients: ['1 butternut squash, peeled and cut into 2.5cm cubes', '1 large onion, cut into 2.5cm cubes', '220g red seedless grapes', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 teaspoon herbes de Provence', '30g pine nuts', '60g feta cheese, crumbled']
